name: BeF SONG COLLECTION
summary:
"All One's Life"
composed & arranged by Tatsuya Watarai
written by Hajime Suzukawa
performed by Mieko

"One's Baby Be"
composed & arranged by Tatsuya Watarai
written by Hajime Suzukawa
performed by Snowy

"Alone Again"
composed & arranged by Tatsuya Watarai
written by Hajime Suzukawa
performed by Snowy

"Sunset"
composed & arranged by Tatsuya Watarai
written by Hajime Suzukawa
performed by CHOCOLAT

"Itsuka, Dokoka de"
composed & arranged by Tatsuya Watarai
written by Hajime Suzukawa
performed by Mieko

"Exit of Karma"
composed & arranged by Tatsuya Watarai
written by Akio Watanabe
performed by CHOCOLAT
